name: @mcptoolshop/prov-engine-js
description: Minimal Node.js provenance engine for prov-spec interop

scripts.test: node prov-engine.js describe && echo '{"value":"test"}' > _test_tmp.json && node prov-engine.js digest _test_tmp.json && node prov-engine.js wrap _test_tmp.json && node -e "require('fs').unlinkSync('_test_tmp.json')"

author: mcp-tool-shop <64996768+mcp-tool-shop@users.noreply.github.com>
